description: Kirishima Keizou is the Buddhist monk in the temple wherein the cat deity dwells. He is the father of http://anidb.net/ch11646 [Kotone] and http://anidb.net/ch11649 [Akari]. As http://anidb.net/ch10899 [Tama] said in the first episode, he often goes to cabaret clubs despite being a monk.
name: Kirishima Keizou
